personalInfo.name: Sabyasachi Sahoo
personalInfo.title: Senior Front-End Developer
personalInfo.summary: Senior Front-End Developer with 10+ years of experience building scalable, high-performance web applications for banking, healthcare, retail, and technology domains. Expert in React (Hooks, Context API), Angular, Vue.js, and TypeScript with proven success in delivering trading platforms, investment dashboards, and enterprise-scale portals for Fortune 500 clients. Skilled in modern UI architecture, responsive design, performance optimization, accessibility, and automated testing. Strong leadership in Agile/Scrum, mentoring, stakeholder collaboration, and cross-functional delivery. Hands-on with Generative AI integration, micro frontends, and cloud deployment.

achievements: Led front-end teams for Leading Financial Firm in US trading platforms improving execution speed by 25%
Built React + AI automation reducing research time by 40%
Built Angular apps boosting engagement by 15%
Developed dashboards for Leading Investing/Financial Services Organization in US using Angular/Vue/TypeScript
Enhanced performance reducing load time by 35%

projects.title: Leading Financial Firm in US Trading Platform
projects.description: Led front-end development for high-frequency trading platforms, improving execution speed by 25% through optimized React architecture and real-time data visualization.

projects.title: Micro-Frontend Portal Architecture
projects.description: Architected and implemented micro-frontend solutions that enabled 30% faster scaling and improved developer productivity across multiple teams.

projects.title: AI-Powered Research Automation
projects.description: Built React application integrated with Generative AI to automate research processes, reducing manual research time by 40%.

projects.title: Dashboard for Leading Financial Services Organization
projects.description: Developed comprehensive investment tracking dashboards with enhanced performance optimization, reducing load time by 35%.
